comments.body: why are we moving the metrics getting only for the `volumes.go` test suites? (this is being done in each of the test suits)

Every other call is in the right place for some reason, i.e. after PrepareTest and before resource creation

The other reference to `getMigrationVolumeOpCounts` is inside a function that's always called in cleanup, after resource deletion

		l.resource = createGenericVolumeTestResource(driver, l.config, pattern)
		if l.resource.volSource == nil {

comments.body: was it intended to remove skip persistent test from `skipUnsupportedTest`? I would think you'd want to add all the various `skipXTest` functions into `skipUnsupportedTest` since it gets called "before resource initialization"
ah I see, its possible different `It`'s can have different skip criterea
